name: Laptop Pro 15
description: High-performance laptop with 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and Intel i7 processor. Perfect for professionals and developers.

name: Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with long battery life and precise tracking. Compatible with all operating systems.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with Cherry MX switches. Great for gaming and typing.

name: Coffee Maker
description: Programmable coffee maker with 12-cup capacity. Includes thermal carafe to keep coffee hot.

name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight running shoes with cushioned sole and breathable mesh upper. Perfect for daily runs.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip yoga mat with extra cushioning. Eco-friendly and easy to clean.

name: Smart Watch
description: Fitness tracker with heart rate monitor, GPS, and 7-day battery life. Water resistant.

name: Desk Lamp
description: LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. USB charging port included.
